entry.title: First Post
entry.summary: Hello is anyone out there! If you are reading this congratulations you now have an unfiltered portal directly into the depths of my thoughts. I will run this blog completly unfiltered and aim to hold nothing back, I feel the same way about comments, I was raised in the time when the internet was open unmonitored and free, in that spirit I will allow livley disscussions on my posts and respect f...
